titleStmt.title: A general confession set furth for all men and saruauntes to say euery morninge before they go to their worke or other busines also graces before dynner [and] supper

publicationStmt.publisher: By Jhon Daye, dwelling ouer Aldersgate beneth Saynte Martins,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
